<@U0J3D11K5>: you will need to add a call to `populate()` in `QuestionSchema.statics.load. This is the code you are looking for: 

```/**
 * Statics
 */
QuestionSchema.statics.load = function(id, cb) {
    this.findOne({
        _id: id
    }).populate('creator', 'name username').populate('answers').exec(cb);```
note an extra call to `populate(‘answers’)`
